TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestWrapper extends System.Web.HttpRequestBase

summary.span: 封装 HTTP 内部对象，该对象使 ASP.NET 可以读取客户端在 Web 请求过程中发送的 HTTP 值。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values that are sent by a client during a Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自 类，用作类的包装 。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 此类公开类的功能 并公开 类型。This class exposes the functionality of the class and exposes the type. 通过类，可以将应用程序中类的原始实现替换为 自定义实现，例如在 ASP.NET 管道之外执行单元测试时。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

span.span: The object that this wrapper class provides access to.

summary.span: 使用指定的请求对象初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified request object.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Abort() cil managed

summary.span: 强制地终止基础 TCP 连接，会导致任何显著的 I/O 失败。

span.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是线程安全的。This method is thread-safe. 任何线程都可以随时调用它。Any thread may call it at any time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与相同， 只不过它还会复制读取到由 ASP.NET 使用的内部存储的字节，以填充 、 和 属性。This method is identical to except that it also copies the bytes that are read to the internal storage that is used by ASP.NET to populate the , , and properties. 由于保留了此信息，如 ASP.NET Web 窗体页面（.aspx 文件）这样的下游代码将成功运行。Because this information is preserved, downstream code such as ASP.NET Web Forms pages (.aspx files) will run successfully. 这不同于使用 方法的情况。This is not the case with the method.

exception.span: 已加载和分析请求的实体主体。

span.span: The request's entity body has already been loaded and parsed.

exception.span: 导致加载和分析实体正文的属性的示例包括：

span.span: Examples of properties that cause the entity body to be loaded and parsed include the following:
- The property.
- The property.
- The property.
- The method.

exception.span: 要避免此异常，请首先调用 方法。

span.span: To avoid this exception, call the method first.

exception.span: 如果客户在实体正文读取时断开连接，则也会引发此异常。

span.span: This exception is also thrown if the client disconnects while the entity body is being read.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateInput() cil managed

summary.span: 引发对通过 、 和 属性访问的集合的验证。

span.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用输入验证标志来确定是否对通过 、和属性访问的请求集合执行验证 。The class uses input validation flags to determine whether to perform validation on the request collections that are accessed through the , , and properties. 方法设置这些标志，以便在 `get` 调用、或属性的访问器时 ，执行输入验证。The method sets these flags so that when the `get` accessors of the , , or properties are invoked, input validation is performed. 验证的工作原理是，针对可能危险的数据的硬编码列表检查所有输入数据。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.
